product_description: Sturdy stretch twill keeps you looking casual and feeling comfortable in staple flat-front shorts cut to hit just above the knee.
product_details_and_care:
Sturdy stretch twill keeps you looking casual and feeling comfortable in staple flat-front shorts cut to hit just above the knee.
9" inseam; 20" leg opening; 11 1/2" front rise; 15 1/2" back rise (size 32)
Zip fly with button closure
Front scoop pockets; back welt and button-welt pockets
64% cotton, 34% polyester, 2% elastane
Machine wash, tumble dry
Imported
Item #5993230
